content.raw: This code, along with most changes to finish\_train, were moved from proc\_train\_results which performed a similar function. From my understanding, max\_params will be the training instance data from the best instance. check\_filenames will be its filenames, for the best params.params, etc. If this instance failed, no filenames would be output and present. I don’t know how this indicates all failed rather than just the best instance.
content.html: This code, along with most changes to finish_train, were moved from proc_train_results which performed a similar function. From my understanding, max_params will be the training instance data from the best instance. check_filenames will be its filenames, for the best params.params, etc. If this instance failed, no filenames would be output and present. I don’t know how this indicates all failed rather than just the best instance.
